bibl.title: The Christian Necropolis in Khargeh Oasis.
bibl.note: The Egyptian expedition of the Metropolitan Museum of Art, 1930-1931. - The largest chapel. - The Eastern chapel. - The burial chambers. - The coffins. - The date of the beginning of the necropolis must be pushed back into the middle of the third century.
Hauser Walter, The Christian Necropolis in Khargeh Oasis.
BMMA 27, Section II, March 1932, pp. 38-50, 19 figg.
